  type="void"
  name={<><a href="#a692390cd6799e674710e434f3658418a">walkGraph</a> (NodeCallbackFn CallbackNode, EdgeCallbackFn CallbackEdge=nullptr, bool SortedWalk=false) const</>}>
Walks every edge and node in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/outlinedhashtree">OutlinedHashTree</a> and calls CallbackEdge for the edges and CallbackNode for the nodes with the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f07bd5ee30b6a57ddc214f64d5fd941">stable&#95;hash</a> for the source and the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f07bd5ee30b6a57ddc214f64d5fd941">stable&#95;hash</a> of the sink for an edge. <a href="#a692390cd6799e674710e434f3658418a">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

### size() {#abfea475152d214caa9b72bad101d75a0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>size&#95;t OutlinedHashTree::size (bool GetTerminalCountOnly=false) const</>}>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the size of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/outlinedhashtree">OutlinedHashTree</a> by traversing it. If <code>GetTerminalCountOnly</code> is true, it only counts the terminal nodes (meaning it returns the the number of hash sequences in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/outlinedhashtree">OutlinedHashTree</a>).
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/cgdata/outlinedhashtree-h/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/cgdata/outlinedhashtree-h">OutlinedHashTree.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/cgdata/outlinedhashtree-cpp/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/cgdata/outlinedhashtree-cpp">OutlinedHashTree.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### walkGraph() {#a692390cd6799e674710e434f3658418a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void OutlinedHashTree::walkGraph (NodeCallbackFn CallbackNode, EdgeCallbackFn CallbackEdge=nullptr, bool SortedWalk=false) const">
Walks every edge and node in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/outlinedhashtree">OutlinedHashTree</a> and calls CallbackEdge for the edges and CallbackNode for the nodes with the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f07bd5ee30b6a57ddc214f64d5fd941">stable&#95;hash</a> for the source and the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3f07bd5ee30b6a57ddc214f64d5fd941">stable&#95;hash</a> of the sink for an edge.

These generic callbacks can be used to traverse a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/outlinedhashtree">OutlinedHashTree</a> for the purpose of print debugging or serializing it.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/cgdata/outlinedhashtree-h/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/cgdata/outlinedhashtree-h">OutlinedHashTree.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/cgdata/outlinedhashtree-cpp/#l00021">21</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/cgdata/outlinedhashtree-cpp">OutlinedHashTree.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
